nodes.documentation:
@dev Interface of the KIP-13 standard, as defined in the
[KIP-13](http://kips.klaytn.com/KIPs/kip-13-interface_query_standard).
 * Implementers can declare support of contract interfaces, which can then be
queried by others.
 * For an implementation, see `KIP13`.
nodes.name: IKIP13

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by
`interfaceId`. See the corresponding
[KIP-13 section](http://kips.klaytn.com/KIPs/kip-13-interface_query_standard#how-interface-identifiers-are-defined)
to learn more about how these ids are created.
     * This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.
nodes.name: supportsInterface

devdoc.details: Interface of the KIP-13 standard, as defined in the [KIP-13](http://kips.klaytn.com/KIPs/kip-13-interface_query_standard). * Implementers can declare support of contract interfaces, which can then be queried by others. * For an implementation, see `KIP13`.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding [KIP-13 section](http://kips.klaytn.com/KIPs/kip-13-interface_query_standard#how-interface-identifiers-are-defined) to learn more about how these ids are created.     * This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.
